## DMart Regional Procurement – Kitchen Appliances & FMCG Supply Proposal
*Date: October 26, 2023*

## 2. Executive Summary
Thank you for your interest in our product range. Based on your request for your regional procurement needs, we have curated a selection of high-performance appliances and essential FMCG items to meet your specified quantity requirements.

## 3. Solution Overview (SKU Mapping)
| Requirement | Proposed SKU | Qty |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| High-Performance Stand Mixer | PowerChef Pro-Mix 7L | 5 |
| Premium Food Processor | MultiChop Ultra 2000 | 5 |
| Energy-Efficient Refrigerator (Small) | ArcticFreeze Compact 180L | 2 |
| Assorted FMCG Pantry Staples | [Details per Annex A] | 500 units |
| Household Cleaning Supplies Bundle | [Details per Annex B] | 150 units |
*Note: The PowerChef Pro-Mix 7L provides a superior 1200W motor and larger bowl capacity, an upgrade from standard models, ensuring greater versatility and durability for your customers.*

## 4. Commercial Summary
- **Subtotal**: ₹4,255.00
- **Taxes (GST)**: ₹765.90
- **Total Proposal Value**: ₹5,020.90

## 5. Terms & Conditions
- **Warranty**: Standard 2-Year Comprehensive Warranty on all appliances.
- **Delivery**: Dispatch within 3-5 business days post-PO.
- **Payment**: Net 30 Days.

## 6. Closing
We look forward to partnering with DMart Regional Procurement. Please sign this proposal to initiate the order.

## DMart – Kitchen Appliances & FMCG Supply Proposal
*Date: October 26, 2023*

## Executive Summary
Thank you for your interest in our product range. Based on your request for your diverse operational requirements, we have curated a selection of high-performance appliances and essential FMCG products to meet your diverse product needs. Our proposal emphasizes quality, reliability, and competitive value to support DMart's commitment to its customers.

## Solution Overview (SKU Mapping)

| Requirement | Proposed SKU | Qty |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| High-Volume Toasters | EcoToast Pro 4-Slice Toaster (Stainless Steel) | 500 |
| Everyday Black Tea (500g) | HarvestFresh Premium Black Tea (500g Pouch) | 2,000 |
| Multi-Function Blenders | PowerBlend Xtreme 1200W Mixer Grinder | 300 |
| Refined Sunflower Oil (1L) | NutriGold Refined Sunflower Oil (1L Bottle) | 5,000 |
| Compact Electric Kettles | RapidBoil 1.8L Cordless Electric Kettle | 750 |
| Assorted Instant Noodles (Multipack) | QuickMeal Spicy Veg Noodles (Pack of 6) | 3,500 |

*Note: The EcoToast Pro Toaster features wider slots for specialty breads, offering enhanced versatility. The PowerBlend Xtreme Mixer Grinder comes with a robust 1200W motor for superior performance and durability. NutriGold Refined Sunflower Oil is fortified with essential Vitamins A & D.*

## Commercial Summary
- **Subtotal**: ₹1,850,000.00
- **Taxes (GST)**: ₹333,000.00
- **Total Proposal Value**: ₹2,183,000.00

## Terms & Conditions
- **Warranty**: Standard 2-Year Comprehensive Warranty on all appliances.
- **Delivery**: Dispatch within 3-5 business days post-PO.
- **Payment**: Net 30 Days.

## Closing
We look forward to partnering with DMart and providing high-quality products that meet your operational demands. Please sign this proposal to initiate the order.
